isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE

svcprocinfo.para: There are two reasons for installing the inner cab door handle, the first is to replace a broken inner cab door handle with a new one. The second is to install the inner cab door handle with the modular door hardware assembly removed and laying on a suitable work surface, to service the modular door hardware assembly or replace the modular door hardware assembly.

If replacing the front cab door inner cab door handle, use the procedure below, Install Front Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle to replace Inner Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

If installing the front cab door inner cab door handle after servicing the modular door hardware assembly, use the procedure below, Install Front Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

If replacing the rear cab door inner cab door handle, use the procedure below, Install Rear Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle to replace Inner Cab Door Handle on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

If installing the rear cab door inner cab door handle after servicing the modular door hardware assembly, use the procedure below, Install Rear Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle to replace Inner Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 91 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Reach up behind the modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) and hold up inner cab door handle control rod (Item 5), with inner cab door handle positioned 90 degrees counter clockwise from it's normal mounted position, slide upper control rod mounting hole of inner cab door handle over the S hook until it is on the long portion of the inner cab door handle control rod (Item 5).

Slide the S hook of the inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) through the lower control rod mounting slot of inner cab door handle. Carefully rotate inner cab door handle 90 degrees clockwise while sliding upper control rod mounting hole of inner cab door handle to the center portion of the S hook making sure the lower control rod mounting slot of inner cab door handle is positioned properly on the S hook of the inner cab door handle control rod (Item 5).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 82 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: With inner cab door handle (Item 2) positioned properly over the window regulator assembly, position both retaining tabs (Item 3) on inner cab door handle into the slots in the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) and slide inner cab door handle to the left to secure retaining tabs in place, driver side shown.

Once the inner cab door handle (Item 2) is positioned properly. Install torx head bolt (Item 1) securing inner cab door handle to the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4), driver side shown. Tighten to 71 to 88.5 Lbf-in (8 to 10 N•m).

Install front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install front cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
Repeat procedure to install a new passenger side front cab door inner cab door handle.

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 92 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If removed, install inner cab door handle control rod (Item 3) with the spring (Item 4) into slotted hole of inner cab door handle (Item 1), then install inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) onto inner cab door handle, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 82 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Install inner cab door handle control rods (Items 2 and 5, Figure 91) through the opening from the front side of the modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 91) and slide inner cab door handle (Item 2) to the left until the inner cab door handle is positioned over the window regulator assembly , driver side shown.

Position both retaining tabs (Item 3) on the inner cab door handle (Item 2) into the slots in the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) and slide inner cab door handle to the left to secure retaining tabs in place, driver side shown.

Once the inner cab door handle (Item 2) is positioned properly. Install torx head bolt (Item 1) securing inner cab door handle to the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4), driver side shown. Tighten to 71 to 88.5 Lbf-in (8 to 10 N•m).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 91 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) laying on it's front, install inner cab door control rod (Item 2) with the spring (Item 3) into retaining clip (Item 4). Make sure the spring is to the right of the retaining clip, driver side shown.
With the front cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 73) placed on a suitable work surface. Install outer cab door handle and cab door latch as follows.
